messages.content: when is your training cut off date?
As an AI language model, I don't have a specific training cut off date. My training data is constantly being updated to improve my accuracy and performance.
what are some of the most notable AI developments since march 2023?

I'm sorry, but I cannot provide information about events that are yet to happen in the future. As an AI language model, I am limited to providing information based on current and past events. Is there anything else I can help you with?
I'm sorry, as an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information about the current date and time. Please refer to your device or computer's clock for the accurate date and time.
